entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Wrong caret position when moving to new line #67950
  • IDE0251 error in error list has no title #67949
  • `PENamedTypeSymbol.MakeDeclaredInterfaces` should check that the types are interfaces #67946
    Backlog
  • CI test failure: Roslyn.VisualStudio.NewIntegrationTests.VisualBasic.BasicArgumentProvider.SimpleTabTabCompletion #67945
  • IDE errors with file-local extension method #67940
    17.7

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix a wrong text span usage in MergeIfStatementsCodeRefactoringProvider #67948
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add import completion option to LSP #67947
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve parsing of switch expressions whith missing `}` or `]` #67943
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Initial support for collection literal spread elements #67942
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EnC refactoring: ProjectBaseline, ProjectDiagnostics, PendingUpdate #67941
    Area-Interactive, untriaged

Merged

  • Add A/B option to test if disabling 'recoverable text' helps/hurts us #67845
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Disable slow source generator 'JSImportGenerator' for Roslyn builds #67944
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • EnC: Implements support for generic type/method updates #67918
    Area-IDE, Interactive-EnC, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Use non-void type for `BoundAwaitOperator` in VB statement #67822
    Language-VB, Area-Compilers, Feature - IOperation, 17.7
  • Interceptors: handle duplicates, additional signature validation, etc. #67786
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Hard code segment constants for common type sizes #67921
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make EnC service a MEF service instead of a workspace service #67896
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Record added node output states as new #66725
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Do not return file-local type requested by unmangled metadata name #67183
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Preserve removed entries in `SyntaxNodeProvider` #67636
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.7
  • Implement ISymbol.LocationList #67881
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Share common code involved into building dictionaries of members for namespace symbols #67933
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add `IsExplicitExtension` #67850
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Remove code lens cache to improve results returned #67884
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Flow the telemetry update change from feature branch to 17.2 release branch #67902
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove the ` bool IsUnsafe(this TypeSymbol type)` method #67831
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Use correct ref-pack versions #67895
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Dev/dibarbet/17 3 servicing #67922
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid stack overflow due to deep recursion on long chain of calls. #67913
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection literals natural type #67364
  • Add a helper diagnostic for enforcing IDE0005 (remove unnecessary usi… #58835
    Area-IDE, 17.6
  • Add FilterSpan API to analyzer contexts #67818
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
